cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.security.saml.validation.metadata

Interface SAMLIdPMetadata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSAMLIdPMetadata, SAMLIdPFilesystemMetadata, SAMLIdPHTTPMetadata, SAMLIdPResourceMetadata

    public interface SAMLIdPMetadata
    Retrieves and allows access to an Identity Provider (IdP) metadata.
    Author:
    cscanigo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      X509Certificate getEncryptionCertificate()
      Get the IdP encryption certificate.
      X509Certificate getSigningCertificate()
      Get the IdP signing certificate.
      void init(String entityId)
      Initializes the object with the entityId of the IdP, as it appears in metadata.
      org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProvider retrieveMetadata(String from)
      Retrieve the IdP metadata.
      void setRefreshDelays(long min, long max)
      For metadata resolvers that refresh their data, the refres interval.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(String entityId)
        Initializes the object with the entityId of the IdP, as it appears in metadata. Required before calling the retrieveIdP...Metadata(...) of implementing classes and the get...Certificate methods.
        Parameters:
        entityId - entity id

      • setRefreshDelays

        void setRefreshDelays(long min,
                      long max)
        For metadata resolvers that refresh their data, the refres interval. Zero values will not be considered. Granted, an intermediate interface defining this method would be nicer.
        Parameters:
        min - min
        max - max

      • retrieveMetadata

        org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProvider retrieveMetadata(String from)
                                                                throws org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProviderException
        Retrieve the IdP metadata. The required entityId inside the metadata will have previously been supplied to the init method.
        Parameters:
        from - Source of the metadata. May be interpreted as a file path, an URL or whatever, depending on the implementing classes.
        Returns:
        metadata provider
        Throws:
        org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider.MetadataProviderException - metadata provider exception

      • getSigningCertificate

        X509Certificate getSigningCertificate()
                               throws org.opensaml.xml.security.SecurityException
        Get the IdP signing certificate.
        Returns:
        signing certificate
        Throws:
        org.opensaml.xml.security.SecurityException - security exception

      • getEncryptionCertificate

        X509Certificate getEncryptionCertificate()
                                  throws org.opensaml.xml.security.SecurityException
        Get the IdP encryption certificate.
        Returns:
        encryption certificate
        Throws:
        org.opensaml.xml.security.SecurityException - security exception
